void mmdb::math::Jacobi ( int  N,
rmatrix  A,
rmatrix  T,
rvector  Eigen,
rvector  Aik,
int &  Signal 
)

Diagonalization of symmetric matrices A[1..N][1..N] by the method of Jacobi.

Parameters:
Ndimension of the matrix
Amatrix to diagonalize; the lower triangle, except the diagonal, will remain unchanged
Teigenvectors placed as columns
Eigenvector of eigenvalues, orderd by increasing
Aikworking array
Signal0 <=> Ok, ItMax <=> iteration limit exchausted.
